nodes.text: Star Wars Trilogy: The Definitive Collection
Star Wars Trilogy: The Definitive Collection was a home release of the original Star Wars trilogy in LaserDisc format. It was released in 1993.

All three films were presented in the Standard Play CAV format, offering full-feature access to every frame. Included were a sixteen-page booklet with production notes and a hardcover book: George Lucas: The Creative Impulse, which documented the first twenty years of Lucasfilm Ltd.
